column2: VIP Gold chat: Media smears SCOTUS veers infrastructure jeers COVID fears and your ears! - Replay
column5: Don’t miss today’s tremendous live interactive VIP Gold chat at 1:30 pm ET with Bearing Arms’ Cam Edwards and HotAir’s Ed Morrissey! The duo will take VIP Gold members’ questions and comments and give an in-depth analysis of the top topics of the day. While Cam brings his A-game on 2nd Amendment and liberty issues and makes sure to keep it real along the way Ed keeps pace with developments abroad at home and at the local level as well. We’ll have plenty to discuss and lots of time to take your questions. The hot topics include: With all the fast-moving developments our VIP Gold members can get the latest as it happens from Cam and Ed.
